wikipedia_page.main: David Hill (birth unknown) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and Lancashire, and at club level for Wigan (Heritage № 657), Oldham (Heritage № 794) and Barrow as a Stand-off or Centre.
